note:
~fluttering from topic to topic~
retired librarian, MLIS, MSc (marine biology)
autistic, living with chronic illness
interests: biology & medicine, natural products, gardening, permaculture, reading, cats

My profile picture is of a male sapphire flutterer (Rhyothemis princeps), a dragonfly with iridescent indigo wings, alighted on a twig. I've never seen one in person (they live in Australia & New Guinea) - I just like them because I like dragonflies and they are an especially pretty species.
